title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Breaking News out of the KHOT News Room!
author: Red Hot Chili Peppers
description:
It has been confirmed that the Red Hot Chili Peppers will embark on a world tour in 2022! Sign up on https://redhotchilipeppers.com for more information.
